article.headline: Gardner-Webb 82, S.C.-Upstate 55
article.story: BOILING SPRINGS, N.C. (AP) -- Thomas Sanders had 19 points and 22 rebounds -- his 18th double-double -- to lead Gardner-Webb to another lopsided win, 82-55 against South Carolina-Upstate on Saturday night. Grayson Flittner added 19 points and hit six 3-pointers for the Runnin' Bulldogs (15-13, 9-5 Atlantic Sun), who have won five straight games -- all by double figures. Aaron Linn scored 13 points, Nate Blank had 11 and Auryn MacMillan finished with 10 for Gardner-Webb, which shot 50 percent and turned 22 turnovers into 26 points. Flittner has made 15 of 20 3-pointers in his last two games for the Runnin' Bulldogs, who avenged a 73-59 loss to the Spartans last month in Spartanburg, S.C. Josh Chavis scored 17 points to lead USC Upstate (7-22, 5-10), which shot just 29 percent in the second half.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
